original_text: Every one of you shall revere his mother and his father, and you shall keep my Sabbaths: I am the Lord your God.
korean_text: 너희 각 사람은 부모를 경외하고 나의 안식일을 지키라 나는 너희의 하나님 여호와이니라

sentences.original_text: Every one of you shall revere his mother and his father
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 각 사람은 자기 어머니와 아버지를 공경해야 하느니라

sentences.original_text: and you shall keep my Sabbaths
I am the Lord your God.
